trans-unit.source: Why is there a "PrestaShop Marketplace" employee?
trans-unit.target: Why is there a "PrestaShop Marketplace" employee?

We've added a "PrestaShop Marketplace" employee for the PrestaShop Marketplace module to work correctly in your back office. We will be able to perform actions on modules (update, activation, setup, etc.) on the behalf of the employees according to their rights

trans-unit.source: For even more security on your website forms, consult our Security & Access modules category on the
trans-unit.target: For even more security on your website forms, consult our Security & Access modules category on the

trans-unit.source: There has been a problem on our side. Refresh your page and if the problem persists, try again later.
trans-unit.target: There has been a problem on our side. Refresh your page and if the problem persists, try again later.

trans-unit.source: Your module needs to be reset. The PrestaShop Marketplace in your back office is no longer working properly. Please try resetting the module in your %link%. If the problem persists, feel free to contact the support.
trans-unit.target: Your module needs to be reset. The PrestaShop Marketplace in your back office is no longer working properly. Please try resetting the module in your %link%. If the problem persists, feel free to contact the support.
